document.title: SP626 Use a Food Thermometer

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: According to the Centers for Disease Control, every year more than 76 million people in the United States become sick from harmful bacteria in food, 300,000 are hospitalized and 5,000 die. These bacteria are especially harmful for the very young, pregnant women, the old and those with conditions that make their immune systems weaker than normal.
